channel.title: Psycho King's Guards text has error
channel.description:
#### What happened?
"Send a guard to protect you or attack someone else. They will be immune to death for the night."
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Well, they're pretty much the opposite of immune to death for the night.
Maybe something like:
"Send a guard to protect you or attack someone else. If used on yourself, you will be immune to death for the night."

item.title: Psycho King's Guards text has error
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Honestly he should just be passivly night immune like the Psychopathic king in FoL

Read full topic
item.source: Psycho King's Guards text has error
